mapper.insert:
select pro_seq.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO project values(#{prjno},#{regdte},#{deadline}, #{subject},#{tlid},#{deptid},#{openStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT deptid, dname FROM dept777 where dname NOT LIKE '최고경영진'
select p.*, ename from project p, emp777 e where prjno=#{prjno} and p.tlid=e.ID
select count(*) from emp777 e, dept777 d where 1=1 and e.deptid = d.deptid AND (e.ename like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or d.dname like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') and d.dname NOT LIKE '최고경영진'

select * from (select rownum rm, d.dname, e.ename, e.job, e.id from emp777 e, dept777 d where 1=1 and e.deptid = d.deptid AND (e.ename like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or d.dname like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') and d.dname NOT LIKE '최고경영진') where rm between #{start} and #{end}

SELECT count(*) FROM project p,emp777 e, dept777 d WHERE 1=1 and openstatus='0' AND e.id=p.tlid and d.deptid=p.deptid
and to_date(p.deadline,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=TO_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')
and TO_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')>to_date(p.deadline,'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND (subject LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or ename LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

select * from (SELECT rownum rm, p.*,e.ename, d.dname FROM project p,emp777 e, dept777 d WHERE 1=1 and openstatus='0' AND e.id=p.tlid and d.deptid=p.deptid
and to_date(p.deadline,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=TO_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')
and TO_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')>to_date(p.deadline,'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND (subject LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or ename LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')) where rm between #{start} and #{end}

SELECT count(*) FROM PROJECT p, PROJECTMEMBER m, dept777 d, (SELECT prjno,COUNT(*)+1 cnt FROM projectmember GROUP BY prjno) c WHERE 1=1 AND p.PRJNO =m.PRJNO AND m.OWNER =#{owner} AND d.DEPTID =p.DEPTID AND c.prjno=p.PRJNO
and to_date(p.deadline,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=TO_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')
and TO_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')>to_date(p.deadline,'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND p.subject LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select * from (SELECT rownum rm, d.DNAME,p.SUBJECT ,p.PRJNO,m.PART, c.cnt FROM PROJECT p, PROJECTMEMBER m, dept777 d, (SELECT prjno,COUNT(*)+1 cnt FROM projectmember GROUP BY prjno) c WHERE 1=1 AND p.PRJNO =m.PRJNO AND m.OWNER =#{owner} AND d.DEPTID =p.DEPTID AND c.prjno=p.PRJNO
and to_date(p.deadline,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=TO_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')
and TO_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')>to_date(p.deadline,'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND p.subject LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') where rm between #{start} and #{end}
SELECT d.dname,e.job, m.part, e.ename, e.id FROM dept777 d, emp777 e, projectmember m WHERE m.prjno=#{prjno} AND m.owner=e.id AND e.deptid=d.deptid
SELECT d.dname, e.job, e.ename FROM dept777 d, emp777 e, project p WHERE p.PRJNO =#{prjno} AND e.id=p.TLID AND e.DEPTID =d.DEPTID
mapper.update: update project set subject=#{subject}, regdte=#{regdte}, deadline=#{deadline}, deptid=#{deptid}, openStatus=#{openStatus} where prjno=#{prjno}
